root.name: Emergency Room: Disaster Strikes
root.description: OverviewEmergency: Disaster Strikes was released in 1999 by Legacy interactive. Human actors guide you through your adventure when a terrible earthquake has sent many people from the city to the ER. Scattered all about the parking lots and hospital are Emergency Room: Disaster Strikespeople who are in dire need of a doctor. You can pick you patient. They each have their own charts with medical history. You are a novice doctor and you must save your patients. You are also required to answer some questions about your patients based on their medical histories. Upon picking your patient they are transferred to an emergency room. Itâ€™s then up to you to treat the patients the best you can. You examine, decide a course of treatment, and see it through. Some of the medical problems included are: heart attacks, broken bones, internal injuries, burns, head trauma, drowning, lacerations and much more. You can treat your patient with such tools as forceps, bandages, splints, IV, and sutures.
